DOC.brief_title: Postpartum Family Planning Service Through Enhanced Family Planning Immunization Services

The Intervention : A . Brief , concise message convey woman group education session regard pregnancy risk , benefit FP , family planning option postpartum period . A mid-course collection process data also conduct 6 month assess degree intervention implement intend provide opportunity corrective action need .
